minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Windows Vista Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 8 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Optical (CD/DVD) drive required in computer for game to start

reviews.review_text: I've spent more time than I care to admit playing this game & still have a copy of it sitting on my desk. If high-shine graphics come secondary to gameplay for you then I highly recommend this game; don't get me wrong, this game has failings but the gameplay still holds its' own even after all these years.
Looks horribly outdated, but one of the space gems back from to good old days. It's not FreeSpace, but it is great.
